医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人类迷你肺模仿动物对纳米材料的反应曼彻斯特大学科学家培育的人类迷你肺可以模仿动物在接触某些纳米材料时的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240427/Human-mini-lungs-mimic-animal-response-to-nanomaterials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240427/Human-mini-lungs-mimic-animal-response-to-nanomaterials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60c4d97d-05e5-463c-bbeb-0f8070ce04ae Sat, 27 Apr 2024 06:05:00 -0400 Human mini-lungs mimic animal response to nanomaterials
阿司匹林对结直肠癌的免疫增强作用被揭示研究表明，阿司匹林有助于人体的免疫系统检测和瞄准癌细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240427/Aspirins-immune-boosting-effects-in-colorectal-cancer-revealed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240427/Aspirins-immune-boosting-effects-in-colorectal-cancer-revealed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84fa97bc-c36e-4b69-913c-26f342fe7f7f Sat, 27 Apr 2024 06:01:00 -0400 Aspirin's immune-boosting effects in colorectal cancer revealed
关于深夜屏幕时间的缺点和数字排毒的健康益处的见解根据 YouGov 的一项睡眠研究，87% 的英国人表示他们在睡觉前一小时内会看手机或平板电脑，其中 25% 的人声称他们会在睡觉前立即看手机。除此之外，74% 的人表示他们晚上会把手机放在卧室里。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240427/Insights-on-the-downsides-of-late-night-screen-time-and-health-benefits-of-digital-detox.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240427/Insights-on-the-downsides-of-late-night-screen-time-and-health-benefits-of-digital-detox.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a214af4a-f83c-44e7-8cac-b2a8faa35c49 Sat, 27 Apr 2024 05:59:00 -0400 Insights on the downsides of late-night screen time and health benefits of digital detox
PET 脑部扫描可揭示多发性硬化症患者隐藏的炎症布莱根妇女医院对 30 人进行的一项研究发现，在多发性硬化症患者中，先进的脑成像技术可以识别传统 MRI 无法发现的隐藏炎症https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240427/PET-brain-scans-could-reveal-hidden-inflammation-in-病人-with-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240427/PET-brain-scans-could-reveal-hidden-inflammation-in-病人-with-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e001db5e-10b3-4208-937c-94088f85191b Sat, 27 Apr 2024 05:47:00 -0400 PET brain scans could reveal hidden inflammation in patients with multiple sclerosis
英国帕金森氏症协会向 Neumora Therapeutics 投资 210 万英镑，用于帕金森氏症新药的临床前测试帕金森氏症英国正在投资 210 万英镑支持 Neumora Therapeutics 进行 NMRA-NLRP3 的临床前测试，NMRA-NLRP3 是一种 NLRP3 抑制剂，有可能减少帕金森氏症患者的炎症并保护脑细胞。 NLRP3 是一种在调节多种炎症过程中发挥作用的蛋白质，这些炎症过程被认为会导致帕金森病的脑细胞受损。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240427/Parkinsone28099s-UK-invests-c2a321-million-in-Neumora-Therapeutics-for-preclinical-testing-of-new-Parkinsone28099s-drug.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240427/Parkinsone28099s-UK-invests-c2a321-million-in-Neumora-Therapeutics-for-preclinical-testing-of-new-Parkinsone28099s-drug.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4e66a20-db2d-4a14-9447-df8c6fcfde8e Sat, 27 Apr 2024 05:43:00 -0400 Parkinson’s UK invests £2.1 million in Neumora Therapeutics for preclinical testing of new Parkinson’s drug
詹姆斯·吉尔博士关于应对全球抗菌素耐药性危机的见解华威大学临床讲师兼执业全科医生 James Gill 博士将参加周一（4 月 29 日）在上议院举办的一场重要活动，该活动的重点是应对全球抗菌素耐药性 (AMR) 危机。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240427/Dr-James-Gills-insights-on-combating-the-global-crisis-of-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240427/Dr-James-Gills-insights-on-combating-the-global-crisis-of-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bebed6b4-aa89-40c6-977c-1e6f3599c1cb Sat, 27 Apr 2024 01:42:51 -0400 Dr. James Gill's insights on combating the global crisis of antimicrobial resistance
利用免疫增强对抗耐药结核病专家们正在研究一种称为宿主定向疗法的新型免疫增强疗法，利用人体自身的免疫系统来靶向结核病，希望它们甚至能够解决该疾病的耐药形式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Harnessing-immune-enhancement-to-combat-drug-pressive-tuberculosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Harnessing-immune-enhancement-to-combat-drug-pressive-tuberculosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b225992a-de6d-4986-97a7-2fa9572bf121 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 21:58:00 -0400 Harnessing immune enhancement to combat drug-resistant tuberculosis
利用 CRISPR/Cas 技术解决抗菌素耐药性问题在关于该主题的第二篇新研究综述中，捷克共和国比尔森市布拉格查尔斯大学医学院和比尔森大学医院微生物学系助理教授 Ibrahim Bitar 将概述 CRISPR 技术的分子生物学解释如何使用它来解决抗菌素耐药性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Leveraging-CRISPRCas-technology-to-address-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Leveraging-CRISPRCas-technology-to-address-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86c2d535-27a8-4837-b9fb-4d3b4662f6de Fri, 26 Apr 2024 21:50:00 -0400 Leveraging CRISPR/Cas technology to address antimicrobial resistance
Quest Diagnostics 基金会扩大与 Green Bronx Machine 的合作，以促进健康公平Quest Diagnostics 基金会今天宣布扩大与 Green Bronx Machine (GBM) 的合作，Green Bronx Machine (GBM) 是一家转型型教育非营利组织，帮助学生和教师将课堂转变为农业学习体验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Quest-Diagnostics-Foundation-expands-collaboration-with-Green-Bronx-Machine-to-advance-health-equity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/Quest-Diagnostics-Foundation-expands-collaboration-with-Green-Bronx-Machine-to-advance-health-equity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e8c7467-6282-47ee-9946-ac6a953a3986 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 21:43:00 -0400 Quest Diagnostics Foundation expands collaboration with Green Bronx Machine to advance health equity
生物学年龄在老年患者肺癌治疗决策中的作用根据美国癌症协会的数据，诊断肺癌的平均年龄是 70 岁。随着年龄的增长，一个人的身体可能更难忍受手术和化疗等癌症治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/The-role-of-biological-age-in-lung-cancer-treatment-decision-making-for-elderly-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240426/The-role-of-biological-age-in-lung-cancer-treatment-decision-making-for-elderly-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05f3f001-4bd7-445d-85c5-045c9a605c88 Fri, 26 Apr 2024 21:35:00 -0400 The role of biological age in lung cancer treatment decision making for elderly patients
